scenario_text.value:
There should be a passage to the gym
in here, right?
Yeah, that’s what they said...
Oh, here it is! There really was a passage!
We did it, Takuma!

Hey Takuma, any luck over there? Did you find
anything?!

Yeee-heeep! Don’t leave me by myself, you
friggin’ jerks!

You’re the one that holed up in the classroom
by yourself, man. Feel like joining us?

Ah, shut up! There’s just more spiderwebs
around, and...th, things change, all right?!
Kewww, kewwwn...

You two get a hold of yourselves. Even
Kunemon is showing more composure than you.
...Is that what composure looks like?

Minoru! Ryo! Look at this! Now we can go save
Aoi!

Hey Takuma, any luck over there? Did you find
anything?!
Check it out, Minoru! Now we can go save Aoi!
Good going, man! Let’s get a move on!
Hmph, so it is finally our time to strike?
Awriiiight, let’s do it!

Yeee-heeep! Don’t leave me by myself, you
friggin’ jerks!

Are you for real?! After staying in the
classroom without helping us search at all?

Ulp! Sh, shut up! There’s just more cobwebs
around, and...th, things change, all right?!

Hey Ryo, look what I found! Now we can go
save Aoi!

Save Aoi?! Who cares about that! Just don’t
leave me behind, okay?!
Kew, kewww!
Kunemon’s ready to go!

Man, there’s a ton more webs down there... If
we’re not careful we could get stuck in them.
Awww, MORE sticky stuff?! Enough alreadyyy!
Who cares, let’s just plow on through!
Hmm...

The enemy uses this too, right? Maybe we
could bust through? Gotta be some way...
...Vinegar. Just like my mom used to do it.
Ohhh, that’s right! My man!
Kew! Kew!
Kunemon offers his own compliments.
Hmph... Shut yer face.

The enemy uses this too, right? Maybe we
could bust through? Gotta be some way...
Vinegaaar!
Oh yeah, the vinegar. Ryo taught us about it.
Ohhh, that’s right! My man!
Kew! Kew!
Kunemon offers his own compliments.
Hmph... Shut yer face.

I think I heard something like that in an
after-school class I had as a kid.
Oh yeah? You’ve got a good memory.
That’s Minoru for you. Reliable in a pinch.
Heh heh, aw shucks!

In an after-school class I had as a kid,
I think I heard that vinegar is effective.
That’s Minoru for you. Reliable in a pinch.

Oh yeah, Ryo pretty much pretty much said the
same thing, if I remember correctly...

Is that right... We’d better bail that guy
out too, y’know?
...Vinegar. Just like my mom used to do it.
Oh yeah? That’s a big help! Thanks, Ryo!
Kewkew! Kewww!
Kunemon says “That’s amazing!”
Hmph... Shut yer face.

Oh yeah, we can melt spiderwebs with vinegar,
can’t we?

Right, vinegar for sticky stuff! That’s what
Ryo told us, isn’t it?

...What’d I tell ya about getting worked up
over nothing?

Oh come on, this is all you, man! We’re just
being grateful.
Kewkew! Kewww!
Kunemon says “That’s amazing!”
Hmph... Shut yer face.
Okay, let’s do this!

Once we go through here, we’ll have to fight
a monster. Is everybody ready?
Of course, Takuma!
Heh, does a bear poop in the woods?
Onward, to battle!

Hey, I’m going too! You ain’t gonna leave me
here by my lonesome, are ya?!
Kewwwy!
Heh, does a bear poop in the woods?
The time has come to vindicate our honor!

I’ll, uh, wait here. I’d just get in the way
anyhow...
Kewww...
Hold on, Aoi, we’re coming!

Ah, don’t run on ahead, Labramon! It’s too
dangerous!
We’ll all go together!
Yeah!
